forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. North wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco tonight, the skyline emerges beneath a blanket of clarity, calm and inviting, with temperatures dipping to a gentle coolness of around forty-nine. A light breeze dances softly, whispering tales of the sea, though the absence of fog allows the city’s lights to sparkle with unencumbered brilliance. As we move into Tuesday, expect the sun to return with grace, casting its warm glow and nudging daytime temperatures near sixty-three, only to settle briefly into the mid-sixties as the afternoon draws to a close. 

This weather presents a charming backdrop for an evening stroll along the Embarcadero, where the crisp air invigorates the spirit and the views of the bay shimmer under the stars. Consider donning a light jacket, perhaps layered with a cozy sweater, perfect for embracing the tranquility of the night while remaining prepared for the fleeting chill. With such delightful conditions, it’s an ideal moment to immerse oneself in the subtle pleasures of the city—perhaps a quiet stop at a local café to indulge in a book as the world hums softly outside, or simply watching the lights flicker against the backdrop of a cloudless night.
